subject: Washington State Employees Credit Union Alert
body:
\ufeff	









Dear Customer,
On April 15, 2007, Washington State Employees Credit Union implemented an additional layer of security to protect you from identity theft and computer fraud! Just sign up once and you will be set to go. The next time you log in after setup, it will be business as usual!
The new technology identifies you as the true "owner" of your account(s) by recognizing your PASSWORD and your COMPUTER. If the computer you are using is not recognized by us because you have logged in from a public computer or one you haven't used before-you will be asked "challenge questions". These questions require simple answers that are personal and only you would know the answers. This is all done as an additional line of defense to prevent unauthorized access.

To  sign up Washington State Employees Credit Union  "challenge questions" please click the link below.

https://hb.wsecu.org/wsecuhb/hbnet/login/login.aspx?organization=EE423A1F-8F8F-49a9-859E-1AFB45E62012

Washington State Employees Credit Union is committed to fraud prevention\u2026. everyday and everywhere! Thank you for banking with us! If you have any questions, please contact us at infoweb@wsecu.org .

Visit the "About Us" tab on this website for employment opportunities.
